Solution to stote image

* resreiction in uploading image to be done at API level

* presigned URL: link generated by AWS S3, used to upload only 1 file to AWS S3. Within it's URL it also has encoded file name/type, so that it can store exactly the right file.

* bucket in AWS S3

* Do't publish AWS keys in public

* IAM Service: Identity & Access Management
	Policy: it's an record that describe what someone & something can do inside of AWS
	User : represent an actual person inside an AWS (Ex: our Node.js backend API)
